description: From a single data description file, this package generates a simple but complete RESTful web interface to a relational database, in the form of containers that run in a Docker environment. This initial version produces containers that are intended for use on the NERSC Spin platform. It was developed as a foundation for the smart catalog created for LDRD FY20 ACTS: Accelerating COVID-19 Testing with Screening.
name: REST Interface Generator (RESTInG) v0.1
